person.note: Yuan(1) Fu [10296] Jinshi # 1. Yuan Fu, WJ, 18.256-7 (wife, born Zhao(1), who married him at age 27 and who died in 1235 at age 59; [interesting to note that females followed the same generational name sequences--at least in imperial clan]. CBD, 3, 1850.
